That's the mute feature. They don't know they're muted, and they get pushed to the bottom and hidden.

However, they'll be visible to others who haven't blocked/muted them in a thread. If you block, they vanish for everyone reading your thread.

talk.utter: I think it's inevitable there would be scope creep with such a tool, and goes against the user-driven moderation basis Bsky was built on. I'm much more comfortable with user lists, simply because if one is bad, you can make your own, or sub to another. Can't do that with site-based moderation.
